explains: adj. 干酪质的；下等的；虚伪的

sentences.en: She had a cheesy grin on her face.
sentences.cn: 她虚伪地龇牙笑了一笑。

sentences.en: Politicians persist in imagining that "the people" warm to their cheesy slogans.
sentences.cn: 政客们始终幻想“人民”对他们虚伪的口号有好感。

sentences.en: He waved with a big cheesy grin.
sentences.cn: 他朝我挥了挥手，脸上带着那种假假的笑容。
